reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 219/11: PUBLICLY FUNDED ORGANIZATIONS - EXCLUSIONS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 219/11: PUBLICLY FUNDED ORGANIZATIONS - EXCLUSIONS

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “First Nation” means a band as defined in the Indian Act (Canada). O. Reg. 219/11, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“First Nation” means a band as defined in the Indian Act (Canada). O. Reg. 219/11, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The following are not publicly funded organizations: 1. A district social services administration board established under the District Social Services Administration Boards Act. 2. A First Nation. O. Reg. 219/11, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. The following are not publicly funded organizations:

1. A district social services administration board established under the District Social Services Administration Boards Act.

2. A First Nation. O. Reg. 219/11, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 219/11, s. 3. Français
content.raw_html:
3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 219/11, s. 3.

Français
